name: Bigfinite Inc.
description: Developer of a data analytics and AI platform designed to improve pharma manufacturing processes. The company's platform offers acquisition, recording, visualization, and analysis of manufacturing data for the optimization of industrial processes in a simple, regulated, and traceable way, enabling pharma and other clients to discover new ways to optimize processes, reduce manufacturing quality issues, and enhance regulatory compliance.
one_liner: Developer of a data analytics and AI platform designed to improve pharma manufacturing processes. The company's platform offers acquisition, recording, visualization, and analysis of manufacturing data for the optimization of industrial processes in a simple, regulated, and traceable way, enabling pharma and other clients to discover new ways to optimize processes, reduce manufacturing quality issues, and enhance regulatory compliance.

name: Scinapsis Analytics Inc
description: Developer of a research intelligence platform designed to accelerate biomedical discoveries. The company's platform uses machine learning and artificial intelligence to translate both closed and open-access data into recommendations for specific experiments regarding antibody extraction, enabling researchers and scientists to run successful experiments in less time without wasting resources.
one_liner: Developer of a research intelligence platform designed to accelerate biomedical discoveries. The company's platform uses machine learning and artificial intelligence to translate both closed and open-access data into recommendations for specific experiments regarding antibody extraction, enabling researchers and scientists to run successful experiments in less time without wasting resources.

name: BILLIONTOONE, INC.
description: Developer of a molecular counter platform intended to increase the resolution of cell-free DNA testing. The company's pan-cancer tumor-naive oncology test precisely quantifies tumor burden from a blood sample to track response to therapy and its prenatal testing procedure focuses on quantitative biology and statistical learning methods to optimize the signal-to-noise ratio and detect single-gene disorders, enabling expecting mothers to detect disorders such as sickle-cell disease, beta-thalassemia, spinal muscular atrophy, and cystic fibrosis through a simple blood test.
one_liner: Developer of a molecular counter platform intended to increase the resolution of cell-free DNA testing. The company's pan-cancer tumor-naive oncology test precisely quantifies tumor burden from a blood sample to track response to therapy and its prenatal testing procedure focuses on quantitative biology and statistical learning methods to optimize the signal-to-noise ratio and detect single-gene disorders, enabling expecting mothers to detect disorders such as sickle-cell disease, beta-thalassemia, spinal muscular atrophy, and cystic fibrosis through a simple blood test.

name: Civet Biosciences Limited
description: Provider of biotechnology service intended to accelerate drug discovery for live bio-therapeutics. The company's service includes a microbiota bank, a clinical intervention platform, and core big data technology that powers their bioinformatics pipeline, enabling researchers to characterize the Asian gut microbiome and understand the varying profiles across country regions.
one_liner: Provider of biotechnology service intended to accelerate drug discovery for live bio-therapeutics. The company's service includes a microbiota bank, a clinical intervention platform, and core big data technology that powers their bioinformatics pipeline, enabling researchers to characterize the Asian gut microbiome and understand the varying profiles across country regions.

name: Effa Corporation
description: Developer of eco-clean disposable products designed to replace plastic analogs with the use of paper to reduce pollution. The company's toothbrush uses innovative nylon that can quickly decompose with little impact on the environment, has a minimalist look, and areas made of recycled paper covered with environmentally friendly lamination made from corn starch, enabling users to get access to easy-to-use, cheap, and stylish toothbrush at a reasonable cost.
one_liner: Developer of eco-clean disposable products designed to replace plastic analogs with the use of paper to reduce pollution. The company's toothbrush uses innovative nylon that can quickly decompose with little impact on the environment, has a minimalist look, and areas made of recycled paper covered with environmentally friendly lamination made from corn starch, enabling users to get access to easy-to-use, cheap, and stylish toothbrush at a reasonable cost.
industry: BioTech & Life Sciences, Sustainability, Utilities (energy, water, waste)

name: Genomelink, Inc.
description: Developer of a personal DNA cloud data upload application designed to make people connect DNA data with insights, products, and research. The company's platform allows members to upload their raw DNA data files and discover their DNA identities and traits through intuitive visualization and scientific-educational content, enabling members to learn about their DNA data while ensuring ultimate transparency.
one_liner: Developer of a personal DNA cloud data upload application designed to make people connect DNA data with insights, products, and research. The company's platform allows members to upload their raw DNA data files and discover their DNA identities and traits through intuitive visualization and scientific-educational content, enabling members to learn about their DNA data while ensuring ultimate transparency.

name: JuiceInnov8 Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a food biotechnology company intended to reinvent the juice industry with a sugar-free and healthier juice. The company's mission is to build the next generation of food & beverage that is healthier for everyone and greater for this planet with the power of biology, uses non-genetically modified microbes to reduce the amount of sugar and calories contained in juices without water dilution, enabling juice producers to customize the amount of natural sugar in their beverages.
one_liner: Developer of a food biotechnology company intended to reinvent the juice industry with a sugar-free and healthier juice. The company's mission is to build the next generation of food & beverage that is healthier for everyone and greater for this planet with the power of biology, uses non-genetically modified microbes to reduce the amount of sugar and calories contained in juices without water dilution, enabling juice producers to customize the amount of natural sugar in their beverages.

name: Nawah Scientific Holding B.V.
description: Operator of an online destination intended to outsource scientific experiments. The company through its online platform, receives experiment requests, offering a core hub of advanced research equipment specializing in natural and medical sciences and providing services online and on-demand, enabling scientists to carry out world-class research regardless of their laboratory equipment, this revolutionizes the scientific research ecosystem.
one_liner: Operator of an online destination intended to outsource scientific experiments. The company through its online platform, receives experiment requests, offering a core hub of advanced research equipment specializing in natural and medical sciences and providing services online and on-demand, enabling scientists to carry out world-class research regardless of their laboratory equipment, this revolutionizes the scientific research ecosystem.

name: Pandorum Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
description: Developer of functional human tissues designed for tissue engineering and regenerative medicine. The company's experimental-stage human liver tissue is created using three-dimensional printing technology and acts as an artificial liver during liver failures or liver transplantation and takes less time to regenerate, enabling surgeons to assure painless liver surgeries.
one_liner: Developer of functional human tissues designed for tissue engineering and regenerative medicine. The company's experimental-stage human liver tissue is created using three-dimensional printing technology and acts as an artificial liver during liver failures or liver transplantation and takes less time to regenerate, enabling surgeons to assure painless liver surgeries.

name: Plantner Inc.
description: Producer of organic fertilizers using technology that extracts plant growth hormones and other beneficial compounds such as alginic acids, amino acids, and phytic acids from ocean byproducts like algae. By harnessing these natural substances from otherwise discarded materials, the company not only maximizes the value of these byproducts but also contributes to the production of environmentally friendly fertilizers.
one_liner: Producer of organic fertilizers using technology that extracts plant growth hormones and other beneficial compounds such as alginic acids, amino acids, and phytic acids from ocean byproducts like algae. By harnessing these natural substances from otherwise discarded materials, the company not only maximizes the value of these byproducts but also contributes to the production of environmentally friendly fertilizers.

name: Proteinea, Inc.
description: Developer of a biotechnology platform intended to integrate biology with engineering and molecular sciences to make protein therapeutics. The company's platform provides traceable, recycled food such as fruits, vegetables, and grains to feed the insects and aims to replace fish meal in aquaculture and animal feed with sustainable alternatives, enabling customers to access an environmentally responsible approach, reduce the volume in landfills while delivering high-quality nutrients for animal and pet food.
one_liner: Developer of a biotechnology platform intended to integrate biology with engineering and molecular sciences to make protein therapeutics. The company's platform provides traceable, recycled food such as fruits, vegetables, and grains to feed the insects and aims to replace fish meal in aquaculture and animal feed with sustainable alternatives, enabling customers to access an environmentally responsible approach, reduce the volume in landfills while delivering high-quality nutrients for animal and pet food.

name: Qualio, Inc.
description: Developer of a quality management platform designed to assist companies that develop and distribute life-saving products and services. The company's platform focuses on quality to empower company growth, crushing audits, and eliminating defects with full visibility and control, enabling businesses to increase efficiency, identify issues and fix crucial problems to achieve their growth objectives.
one_liner: Developer of a quality management platform designed to assist companies that develop and distribute life-saving products and services. The company's platform focuses on quality to empower company growth, crushing audits, and eliminating defects with full visibility and control, enabling businesses to increase efficiency, identify issues and fix crucial problems to achieve their growth objectives.

name: Strateos, Inc.
description: Developer of a robotic cloud lab platform designed to accelerate drug discovery and synthetic biology research. The company's platform automates chemistry, biology, and tissue analysis into closed-loop robotic labs that accelerate drug discovery programs, enabling pharmaceutical partners to rapidly and efficiently discover new drug candidates.
one_liner: Developer of a robotic cloud lab platform designed to accelerate drug discovery and synthetic biology research. The company's platform automates chemistry, biology, and tissue analysis into closed-loop robotic labs that accelerate drug discovery programs, enabling pharmaceutical partners to rapidly and efficiently discover new drug candidates.

name: Twinn Health Limited
description: Developer of healthcare tools intended for early disease detection using imaging and AI tools to extend a healthy human lifespan. The company's platform uses MRI scanning and AI to get information about metabolism and body composition, enabling healthcare professionals to look for warning signs of potential inflammation, damage, and disease in major organs, muscles, and bones.
one_liner: Developer of healthcare tools intended for early disease detection using imaging and AI tools to extend a healthy human lifespan. The company's platform uses MRI scanning and AI to get information about metabolism and body composition, enabling healthcare professionals to look for warning signs of potential inflammation, damage, and disease in major organs, muscles, and bones.

name: Allevi, Inc.
description: Developer of 3D bioprinters and bioinks intended to cure disease, eliminate the organ waiting list and reverse climate change. The company's 3D bioprinters and bioinks provide a printer that uses a special ink combined with biomaterials and living cells to build 3D living tissue and miniature human organs to unleash the biological revolution
one_liner: Developer of 3D bioprinters and bioinks intended to cure disease, eliminate the organ waiting list and reverse climate change. The company's 3D bioprinters and bioinks provide a printer that uses a special ink combined with biomaterials and living cells to build 3D living tissue and miniature human organs to unleash the biological revolution

name: Prenetics Limited
description: Developer of a pharmacogenomics platform designed to offer personalized, predictive and preventive treatments. The company's pharmacogenomics platform offers a health-coaching application that provides individuals with a DNA profile in order to facilitate optimal diet, fitness and response to drugs and enables them to understand their genetic risk of common health conditions such as Type 2 Diabetes, High Blood Pressure and High Cholesterol, enabling physicians to help patients identify the right drug, right dosage and to list out potential adverse drug effects (ADEs), based on one's genetic profile platform.
